metadata.title: Report of action for mitigation work on bat roosts
metadata.submissionGuidance: We’ll send you an email to let you know the outcome. You’ll usually get a response within 10 working days.

pages.title: Report of compensation

components.name: VISLFz
components.title: Html
components.content:
You will need to submit a report of compensation within 4 weeks of compensation measures being completed.

Continue with this submission and then use the report of compensation form (opens in new tab).

components.name: UlArda
components.title: How many of this bat species did you observe in roost but did not take?

components.name: IuRXUG
components.title: Html
components.content:
Impacted roosts

This section asks for information relating to the roosts impacted by the licensed works.

Record the highest level of impact and do not double-count roosts. For example, if a roost was damaged and then destroyed, only record it as being destroyed. All fields are optional.

components.title: Html

components.name: bkBTDc

pages.title: Report an action for mitigation work on bat roosts

components.name: Fvxxhl
components.title: Html
components.content:
Use this form to tell Natural England about a report of action taken under each CL47 site registration. You must do this within 4 weeks of completing the licenced actions.

You must also tell Natural England if you've taken no action. This is known as a nil return.

pages.title: Nil return

components.name: kmVWgQ
components.title: Html
components.content:
You are about to submit a nil return.

[Add more information about nil returns]
